verbose_text: The major AMPK regulated pathway, which reduces the risk of obesity and IR, stimulates fatty acid (FA) oxidation and inhibits FA synthesis by phosphorylating and downregulating acetyl-CoA carboxylase, a rate limiting reaction in the conversion of acetyl-CoA to malonyl-CoA.
evidence: AMPK-regulated pathway, which reduces the risk of obesity and IR, stimulates fatty acid (FA) oxidation and inhibits FA synthesis by phosphorylating and downregulating acetyl-CoA carboxylase
